con:part.con:content:
{"swagger":"2.0","info":{"version":"v1.0.0","title":"API server interfaces","description":"API server interfaces"},"schemes":["https"],"consumes":["application/json"],"produces":["application/json"],"paths":{"/api/v1/remit/in/invite":{"post":{"operationId":"ccInviteRequest","summary":"Create a payment request
","description":"Request payment from someone.
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request payment request
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/CCInviteRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/InboundResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/remit/in/withdraw":{"post":{"operationId":"withdrawRequest","summary":"Create a withdraw request
","description":"Request getting money to user bank card.
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to withdraw money
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/WithdrawRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/InboundResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/banks/bindCard":{"post":{"operationId":"bindCardRequest","summary":"Create a bind card request
","description":"Request a card bind
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to verify card
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BindCardRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/ResponseObject"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/banks/binQuery":{"post":{"operationId":"binRequest","summary":"Create a bin query request
","description":"Request a card bin query
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to query card info
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BinRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BinResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/banks/fx":{"post":{"operationId":"fXRateRequest","summary":"Create a fx request
","description":"Request for fx
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to query fx
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/FXRateRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/FXRateResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/jobs/quota":{"post":{"operationId":"retrieveQuotaRequest","summary":"Create a quota request
","description":"Request a quota for one user
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to query user remain quota
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RetrieveQuotaRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/QuotaResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/jobs/contacts":{"post":{"operationId":"retrieveContactsRequest","summary":"Create a contacts request
","description":"Request a contacts for one user
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to query user's recent contacts
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RetrieveContactsRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RetrieveContactsResponse"}}}}}}},"/api/v1/jobs/retrieve":{"post":{"operationId":"retrieveRequest","summary":"Create a user's inboud record/outbound record/waiting withdrawing record request
","description":"Request a record retrieve
","parameters":[{"in":"body","name":"body","description":"A request to query user's inboud record/outbound record/waiting withdrawing record request
","schema":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RetrieveRequest"}}],"responses":{"200":{"description":"OK","schema":{"properties":{"response":{"$ref":"#/definitions/RetrieveResponse"}}}}}}}},"definitions":{"CCInviteRequest":{"description":"CC send invite request to CG
","type":"object","required":["sender","recipient","fromCurrency","fromAmount","toCurrency","toAmount"],"properties":{"sender":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IndividualUser"},"senderId":{"type":"integer"},"recipient":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IndividualUser"},"recipientId":{"type":"integer"},"fromCurrency":{"type":"string","description":"CNY/USD/EUR/GBP"},"fromAmount":{"type":"integer"},"toCurrency":{"type":"string","description":"CNY/USD/EUR/GBP"},"toAmount":{"type":"integer"},"source":{"type":"string"},"outRemitType":{"type":"integer","description":"realTime(0),twentyFour(1),normal(2)"},"theme":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Theme"},"channelType":{"type":"integer","description":"unknown(0),allinpay(1)"},"withdrawType":{"type":"integer","description":"UNKNOWN(0),DIRECT_WITHDRAW(1),MANUAL_WITHDRAW(2)"},"withdrawInfo":{"$ref":"#/definitions/WithdrawInfo"},"settleType":{"type":"string","description":"bitcoin or wire"}}},"InboundResponse":{"description":"response of inbound
","type":"object","properties":{"jobId":{"type":"string","description":"when invite or create job, this will be jobId returned. Otherwise, this field is null"},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"WithdrawRequest":{"description":"withdraw info, need bank card info and user id info
","type":"object","required":["jobId","status","id","idType","tel","bankCode","accountNo","accountName"],"properties":{"jobId":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer","description":"27, withdrawing(27)"},"id":{"type":"string"},"idType":{"type":"integer","description":"IDCARD(0),HOUSEHOLD(1),PASSPORT(2),OFFICERCERTIFICATE(3),SOLDIERCERTIFICATE(4),HKMACRESIDENT(5),TAIWANGPASS(6),TEMPIDCARD(7),FOREIGNRESIDENCE(8),POLICECERTIFICATE(9),OTHER(10)"},"tel":{"type":"string"},"bankCode":{"type":"string"},"accountType":{"type":"integer","description":"debitCard(0),bankBook(1),creditCard(2)"},"accountNo":{"type":"string"},"accountName":{"type":"string"},"accountProp":{"type":"integer","description":"personal(0),company(1)"},"cvv2":{"type":"string"},"validate":{"type":"string"}}},"BindCardRequest":{"description":"bind card request
","type":"object","required":["partnerId","bankCode","accountNo","accountName","accountProp","idType","id","tel"],"properties":{"partnerId":{"type":"string"},"bindId":{"type":"string"},"relateId":{"type":"string"},"bankCode":{"type":"string"},"accountType":{"type":"integer","description":"debitCard(0),bankBook(1),creditCard(2)"},"accountNo":{"type":"string"},"accountName":{"type":"string"},"accountProp":{"type":"integer","description":"personal(0),company(1)"},"idType":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string"},"relatedCard":{"type":"string"},"tel":{"type":"string"},"merrem":{"type":"string"},"remark":{"type":"string"},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"BinRequest":{"description":"Request card bin info
","type":"object","required":["cardAccount"],"properties":{"cardAccount":{"type":"string","description":"bank card"}}},"BinResponse":{"description":"card bin info response
","type":"object","properties":{"bankInfo":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BinRep"},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"BinRep":{"description":"card bin info response from tl
","type":"object","properties":{"ACCTNO":{"type":"string"},"ISSNAME":{"type":"string"},"ISSCODE":{"type":"string"},"ISSID":{"type":"string"},"ISSIDLEN":{"type":"string"},"CARDTYPE":{"type":"string"},"BANKCODE":{"type":"string"}}},"FXRateRequest":{"description":"Request fx
","type":"object","required":["bankId","toCurrency"],"properties":{"bankId":{"type":"integer","description":"bank id, -1--cg, -2--allinpay, other represents banks"},"refBankId":{"type":"integer","description":"reference bank id"},"fromCurrency":{"type":"string"},"toCurrency":{"type":"string"}}},"FXRateResponse":{"description":"fx response
","type":"object","properties":{"rates":{"type":"string","description":"{CNY: {EUR: 7.23,GBP: 8.54,USD: 6.95}}"},"refRates":{"type":"string","description":"{CNY: {EUR: 7.23,GBP: 8.54,USD: 6.95}}"},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"RetrieveRequest":{"description":"used to get user inboud record/outbound record/waiting withdrawing record
","type":"object","required":["userId","type"],"properties":{"userId":{"type":"integer"},"type":{"type":"integer","description":"0-outbound, 1-inboud, 2-withdraw"},"fromTime":{"type":"string"}}},"RetrieveResponse":{"description":"user inboud record/outbound record/waiting withdrawing record
","type":"object","properties":{"results":{"type":"array","items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BriefOrderInfo"}},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"BriefOrderInfo":{"description":"record info
","type":"object","properties":{"jobId":{"type":"string"},"senderId":{"type":"integer"},"recipientId":{"type":"string"},"currency":{"type":"string"},"amount":{"type":"integer"},"state":{"type":"integer"},"time":{"type":"string"},"bankId":{"type":"integer"},"theme":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Theme"}}},"RetrieveQuotaRequest":{"description":"Used to get one user's quota. In fact, this object does not exist, it's just reusing RetrieveRequest
","type":"object","required":["userId"],"properties":{"userId":{"type":"string"},"fromTime":{"type":"string"}}},"QuotaResponse":{"description":"user remain quota
","type":"object","properties":{"quota":{"type":"integer"},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"RetrieveContactsRequest":{"description":"Used to get one user's recent contacts. In fact, this object does not exist, it's just reusing RetrieveRequest
","type":"object","required":["userId"],"properties":{"userId":{"type":"string"},"fromTime":{"type":"string"}}},"RetrieveContactsResponse":{"description":"user recent contacts. In fact, this object does not exist, it's just reusing RetrieveResponse
","type":"object","properties":{"results":{"type":"array","items":{"description":"An recent contact user id","title":"userId","type":"integer"}},"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"IndividualUser":{"description":"both used for sender and recipient
","type":"object","required":["identityType","identity"],"properties":{"identityType":{"type":"string","description":"email or phone"},"identity":{"type":"string"},"refId":{"type":"string"},"tlAcctUuid":{"type":"string"},"ccUserId":{"type":"integer"},"givenName":{"type":"string","description":"for money sender, givenName can be null, money recipient must have givenName"},"familyName":{"type":"string","description":"for money sender, givenName can be null, money recipient must have givenName"},"dob":{"type":"string"},"phone":{"type":"string"},"address":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Address"},"verification":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Verification"}}},"Theme":{"description":"descript transaction purpose
","type":"object","properties":{"briefWord":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"integer","description":"REDPACKET(0),WHISPER(1),FILIALPIETY(2)"},"picture":{"type":"string"}}},"WithdrawInfo":{"description":"withdraw info, when user claim the money
","type":"object","required":["id","idType","tel","accountNo","accountName","accountProp"],"properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"idType":{"type":"integer","description":"IDCARD(0),HOUSEHOLD(1),PASSPORT(2),OFFICERCERTIFICATE(3),SOLDIERCERTIFICATE(4),HKMACRESIDENT(5),TAIWANGPASS(6),TEMPIDCARD(7),FOREIGNRESIDENCE(8),POLICECERTIFICATE(9),OTHER(10)","example":0},"tel":{"type":"string"},"bankCode":{"type":"string"},"accountType":{"type":"integer","description":"debitCard(0),bankBook(1),creditCard(2)"},"accountNo":{"type":"string"},"accountName":{"type":"string"},"accountProp":{"type":"integer","description":"personal(0),company(1)"}}},"Address":{"description":"The address of a participant","type":"object","properties":{"street1":{"type":"string"},"street2":{"type":"string"},"city":{"type":"string"},"postalCode":{"type":"string"},"district":{"type":"string"},"countryCode":{"type":"string"}}},"Verification":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string"},"method":{"type":"string"},"issuingCountry":{"type":"string"}}},"ResponseObject":{"description":"A response object only has status
","type":"object","required":["status"],"properties":{"status":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Status"}}},"Status":{"description":"A status object describing the result of an operation
","type":"object","required":["version"],"properties":{"version":{"type":"integer"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"A message describing any errors in more detail
","example":"Success"},"code":{"type":"integer","description":"an error code for the specific error, 0 for success","example":0},"property":{"type":"string","description":"A property passed in that caused an error
"}}}},"host":"virtserver.swaggerhub.com","basePath":"/guobiao960/api-server/v1.0.0"}
